thread.title: Watch eight Californians get drunk on Oregon IPA
thread.title_full: Watch eight Californians get drunk on Oregon IPA | OregonLive.com

author: Michael Russell | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch eight Californians get drunk on Oregon IPA
text:
"Did I just drink a tree?"
For some reason, Real Estate firm Movoto gathered eight Californians together to drink and critique five Oregon IPAs. Their reactions are pretty funny.
Choice lines:
"Is this what they have after a whole day of lugging lumber?"
"I'm feeling mango notes. I'm also feeling like killing myself for having said that."
"This tastes like it came from a single woman's herb garden."
Beers drank:
Gigantic IPA
Ninkasi Brewing Tricerahops Double IPA
Laurelwood Brewing Workhorse IPA
GoodLife Sweet As Pacific Ale
HUB IPA
Here's the video:
-- Michael Russell
